title: Katie Price 'bombards ex Charles Drury's mum with texts' after cocaine binge claims
text:

Katie Price has reportedly been bombarding her ex Charles Drury's mum with texts after he made shocking claims about their relationship.

The former glamour model, 41, ranted to his mum out of the blue about how "cruel" he was for selling a story about her, it's claimed.

Charles, 22, had said Katie was on drugs every day in their relationship and would go for long periods of time without sleep after taking cocaine.

He claimed they slept together within hours of first meeting and even accused her of texting married men.

Katie has denied the claims and even confronted his family about them, according to The Sun Online.

(Image: Brett D. Cove / Splash News)

She allegedly texted Charles' mum: "So disappointed that Charles has done a story on me just because me and him didn't work out."

She adds: "I know you stuck up for him but so wrong on all levels so cruel.

"Saying I'm on drugs everyday things like that saying I've been messaging married men which I'd never do."

(Image: Facebook)

Mirror Online has contacted Katie's reps for comment.

Charles said they'd slept together hours after they first met after taking cocaine while she was still with her on/off boyfriend Kris Boyson.

(Image: Instagram)

He also claimed she'd not sleep for days on end while on binges, which Katie's rep denied.

Her rep told us: "Kate is not angry with Charles. Given what she now knows about him it was inevitable he would sell a story to try to publicise himself.

"Kris and Kate are over Charles who is behaving like the little boy he is."
description: The former glamour model, 41, ranted to his mum out of the blue about how 'cruel' he was, it's claimed
